sourcesContent:
{{ errorService.error$ | async }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ErrorService } from 'src/app/services/error.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-global-error', templateUrl: './global-error.component.html', styleUrls: ['./global-error.component.scss'], }) export class GlobalErrorComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public errorService: ErrorService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
